title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.33 - Changes in approval requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.33 - Changes in approval requirements

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles, at his discretion, reserves the right to alter or change the requirements specifications or to
require additional or supplementary tests at any time. The commissioner further
reserves the right to require the manufacturer to furnish without cost a
reasonable number of samples selected by the commissioner from manufacturers', distributors', or retailers' stock for verification reports. The cost of
verification tests shall be borne by the manufacturer. If any such report
discloses any unapprovable deviation from the standards upon which the approval
was based, the commissioner may, upon due notice to the manufacturer, revoke
the approval. Approval may be withdrawn at any time and for any cause deemed
reasonable by the commissioner or the commissioner may require new approvals
any time he may deem necessary or reasonable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
54.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
